properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 c1 c1 c1 c1 c1 c1 c1 c1 c1 c1 c1 c1 c1 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Who spread out the clouds before Him?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Who fashioned the earth with His hands?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Who created the starry host and form the earth at His command?

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Commands the rain and snow to fall?

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: King of kings Lord of lords

verse.name: c1g
verse.lines: He is like the light at sunrise

verse.name: c1h
verse.lines: Like the brightness after the rain

verse.name: c1i
verse.lines: Seated on His heav'nly throne above

verse.name: c1l
verse.lines: Yet He loves me with an everlasting love
